channel.title: 1.6 on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in 1.6 on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: 1.6.1.x: what’s next
item.description: This last year, the PS company has been facing a dilemma: how to dedicate 100% of the developers’ time to move forward faster on the 1.7 version of the open source project, something everybody agrees on. And, at the same time, provide more time for merchants still using the 1.6 version to get ready to upgrade, by keeping them safe in case of critical issue after the official support ends on the 30th of June 2019. We have come up with a solution, thanks to the initiative and support of a few volunteers from the PrestaShop developer community: allowing them to take over the responsibility of maintaining PrestaShop 1.6.1.x beyond the end of official support.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.5.2 and 1.6.1.24
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.5.2 and 1.6.1.24 are now available. These versions fix a security issue for both 1.7.5.x and 1.6.1.x. For the details, please read below:

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.4.4 and 1.6.1.23
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.4.4 and 1.6.1.23 are now available. These versions fix a security issue for both 1.7.4.x and 1.6.1.x. For the details, please read below:

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.6.1.22
item.description: PrestaShop 1.6.1.22 is now available. It fixes an important bug introduced in 1.6.1.21:

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.4.3 and 1.6.1.21
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.4.3 and 1.6.1.21 are now available. These versions fix a security issue for both 1.7.4.x and 1.6.1.x. Some important issues are also fixed for 1.6.1.x. For the details, please read below.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.3.4 and 1.6.1.20
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.3.4 and 1.6.1.20 are now available. These versions fix security and PHP compatiblity issues.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.3.3 and 1.6.1.19
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.3.3 and 1.6.1.19 are now available. Those maintenance releases fixes specific issues for the GDPR compliance.

item.title: PrestaShop & GDPR
item.description: As you are probably already aware, in a few weeks (May 25th of this year) the new european law on personal data protection will come into effect.

item.title: Announcing our 2018 release schedule
item.description: Today we are shining a light on a crucial information, long requested: our release calendar for the next versions of PrestaShop 1.7 and 1.6!

item.title: PrestaShop 2018 release schedule
item.description: Our release calendar for the next versions of PrestaShop 1.7 and 1.6.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.6.1.18
item.description: PrestaShop 1.6.1.18 is now available. This maintenance release has seen 25 pull requests merged since version 1.6.1.17.

item.title: A year into 1.6 maintenance: the way forward
item.description: A year ago, we released PrestaShop 1.7.0.0, and put version 1.6 in maintenance mode. The plan is to maintain it for two years, with regular patch releases. Approaching the one-year mark, time for a review!

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.6.1.17
item.description: PrestaShop 1.6.1.17 is now available. This maintenance release has seen 17 pull requests merged since version 1.6.1.16.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.6.1.16
item.description: PrestaShop 1.6.1.16 is now available. This maintenance release has seen 20 pull requests merged since version 1.6.1.15.

item.title: 6 months of PrestaShop
item.description: July is almost over and more than 6 months have come and gone since the beginning of the year. Time to gather some numbers and make sense of them. Infographic included!
